{{Description|Adeptal ties that bind with fleeting colors in flight, ushering in a new year with a thousand lights.|[https://hoyolab.com/article/9078416 Melody of Dreamlike Wanderings]}}
'''Devastation and Redemption''' is a soundtrack from the EP album ''Fleeting Colors in Flight (Album)''.

The song was composed by [[Yu-Peng Chen]] and arranged by Dimeng Yuan of [[HOYO-MiX]], and written by Dou of the Creative Concept and Writing Team.<ref name="cloud-music">NetEase Cloud Music: [https://music.163.com/#/song?id=1910911958 {{zh|神女劈观·唤情}} Devastation and Redemption]</ref> The vocals were performed by Yang Yang ({{zh|杨扬}}) of the Shanghai Jingju Theatre Company.

The soundtrack was featured in an animated cutscene from the [[Archon Quest]] ''[[Where the Heart Finds Rest]].'' The scene is referred to as {{lang|'''''The Divine Damsel of Devastation'''''|zh=神女劈观|zh_rm=Shénnǚ Pīguàn}}.
__TOC__
